title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-3.3 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-3.3 - Application

State Regulations
(a) The requirements of this Subpart shall apply to all spray grounds except: (1)
a facility owned and/or maintained by an individual for the use of his family and friends; (2)
a facility that uses water that complies with Subpart 5-1 of this Title or equivalent standards that discharges to waste without impoundment or recirculation of the water; (3)
where spray features are installed in a swimming pool, wading pool, wave pool or other pool regulated under Subpart 6-1 of this Part. (b) Section
6-3.5
of this Subpart shall not apply to spray grounds maintained and operated in connection with a temporary residence, children's camp or campground subject to the regulations of Subpart 7-1, 7-2 or 7-3 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
6-3.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
